data.message: All those people to see you.. respect and salute Marshall art x it's a rap...trap.. wrap it up xx exit please..

replies.message: You mix it up for sure.. Like an earworm.. So distracting.. Even through the cussing I hear you angry one x
Not Bob.. But you sing the same.. So fast.. Really you shout it out white boy... I love it..  Keep wrapping.. Father Christmas x
And you may.. For sure.. You got shit cards.. Deal them back.. Refuse.. Fold.. Redeal mofos... I'll get you eventually
Or sit stay like a dog.. If you prefer.. You may.. You may work shit out... You clever.. Pause.. Fuckers... Eminem is scratching his chin... Mastermind for sure
Got to stay ahead... Hunger games... Survival of the whaaaaaaaaat????? I'm star jumping and you???
Always from cape town... With love x
Control alt delete.. Fucksakes.. Outta here....
I'm looking for my moon men stickers.. They keep disappearing.. Got to download again!!!! Fucksakes.. Anyway... Beam me up Scotty for lack of appropriate visual
Picturesssss .. Wanna see.. Me too.. So boing without..

To retrace.. goodness.. where was I? ?I knew or thought I had something to say maybe.. I don't know. . Really. . Or do I? ? I'm confused??? No you're confused.. I somewhere said.. go download cheats becoz they don't play right.. no.. you read faster than me.. I'm so lazy I know. . Now what.. you do think so much... ... .. I'll be back ... I got something to do I'm sure..

I do get tired of running around in my own mind yes. . It's exhausting and then I say stuff not everyone gets and I feel the need to explain myself all the time.. I'm sure I think different.. I do ask why alot.. Becoz I'm trying to undestand... atleast I'm trying.. I just jumped in the doctors chair again.. where I speak my mind.. confession over.. thank you for listening becoz you know I do you... I do feel better.. and i have washing to take off the line yes... so with love always.. from Cape town..
That was hilarious.. thank you edit.. I just told you to take washing off the line by accident... control alt delete.. zap myself out

I got so embarrassed for my typo.. I ran away.. and forgot to send you love x from Cape town.. ofcourse.. where the mountain is.. smile and know.. someone down there thinks you're awesome xxx I say this in my hoodie ofcourse.. you are very distracting yes..

Been waiting on someone to hate this message... thank you... time to explain m6 words... respect!! And salute x speaks for itself.... a rap trap??? Eminem ❤ tries to reach all the time... it's a hit and miss with his lyrics.. everyone on different levels... so he is forever truing to compute where you are?? And he's so clever ... he's transforms... to speak to you..... 
Wrap it up... like a father Christmas. .. with love... I'll sit on his knee for sure... anyway... 
Exit please... it's hard work trying to get through to send a message... so please... let him be x he did his job... and so well in supersonic speed... with words so quick... you do need a laptop to compute.... x love you Eminem ❤. .. from Cape town with love as always... I get you??? Ofcourse I do... been listening to you ... like an ear worm you are.. your words... I am speechless for once
So babe if you have a problem with a message I sent to him??? Whatever...
You not computing.... so stop disputing... rasputin. . I wanna say...
